body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

## Steps to Reproduce
Reproduce Project:  https://github.com/songtao542/BugReport.git


_Please tell us what you were doing and what went wrong_
flutter v1.9.1+hotfix.2 have this problem ( but flutter v1.7.8+hotfix.4 doesn't have this problem)

![OJ3mLV](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5105572/64614466-290da680-d40b-11e9-8e32-fd9a4be93226.gif)

title: Image disappear when scroll listview(gridview).
